column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I couldn't recommend this place enough... it's not a place that will be buzzing with annoying tourists
column2: but it is busy because Lou's isn't a secret.  The service is good but be patient
column3: it takes a while to cook the stuff.  If your in a rush you can call ahead and put in your order (or if there is a wait
column4: you can order so it cooks while you wait for your table... do this
column5: be smart don't wait until you sit down to order a pizza that takes more than 20 min to cook).
